name: Power (ddvorak)
description:
Power is a top-down 3D strategy game where the player will command a squad of three unique mechs through three unique environments in an effort to reclaim power for their city. Made in Unreal Engine 4 and developed for Windows/PC, the adventure through enemy territory is treacherous and fun.

Utilize various types of attacks to destroy your enemies!

Gather resources and craft usable items to heal, protect, or boost your team!

Plan out the perfect strategy to take back the power that is rightfully yours!

Made as a project for the UCF Game Design program, it would not be possible without the efforts of all members of Galvanized Games. 

Producer - Steven Brown

Creative Director - Daniel Dvorak

Tech Lead - Welen Wang

Design Lead - Ryan Bakerman

Designers - Justin Kwan, Kevin Hacker

Artists - Brennan Kahl, Douglas Connell, Sean Cioffi-Stephenson
